resources.string: Please check if you have already registered with this email. We only allow one account per email.
Please select recover password option from ‘Sign In’ menu. After that follow the instruction provided there.
Did not receive an email to recover password?
It takes some time for us to process your request. So, please try again and if after a few minutes you still don’t receive an email, please contact us.
Can I only use offline mode?
Yes, you can. However you won\'t get many of the functionalities that are only provided in online mode.
Why cannot offline mode find any new devices?
To find new devices, you need to give location permission.

Both you and the device you’re trying to connect must have same client, which is JAM app.\nAlso both devices need to try to connect at same time, which means that, if you are trying to connect to a device using offline chat, then receiver device needs to try to do the same.
Why does offline chat shows connected but does not show my messages in receiver device?
It\'s most likely because both devices did not connect to same channel. Try to go back an connect again.
Can I help you to maintain this project?
Yes, you can. Simply go to https://github.com/amritoo/JAM and help us out. :)
